tgt_original: 方便者，謂菩薩戒乃至三十七品。 菩薩戒者，聞說法時心忍信受。

src_original: tatrāsminnaṣṭavidhe 'dhimuktyādhiṣṭhāne bodhisattvasya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmadhimuktibahulatā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 所謂十二部經，是名菩薩戒。 學菩薩戒者當修二事：

src_original: tatra dharmaṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ kiṃ paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 求法者，求何事？

src_original: kathaṃ paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 云何求？

src_original: kimarthaṃ (Dutt 68) paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 何故求？

src_original: samāsato bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭakañca paryeṣate śrāvakapiṭakañca /  vāhyakāni ca śāstrāṇi laukikāni ca śilpakarmapasthānāni paryeṣate /
tgt_original: 求者，謂菩薩藏、聲聞藏、一切世論、一切世事。

src_original: tatra dvādaśāṅgādvacogatādyadvaipulyaṃ tadvodhisattvapiṭakam /
tgt_original: 菩薩藏者，謂毘佛略；

src_original: avaśiṣṭaṃ śrāvakapiṭakaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 餘十一部名聲聞藏。

src_original: bāhyakāni punaḥ śāstrāṇi samāsatastrīṇi /
tgt_original: 世論者有三種：

src_original: hetuśāstraṃ śabdaśāstraṃ cikitsaka śāstrañca /
tgt_original: 一者因論； 二者聲論； 三者醫方論。

src_original: tatra laukikāni śilpakarmasthānānyanekavidhāni bahunānāprakārāṇi /  suvarṇakārāyaskāramaṇikārakarmajñānaprabhṛtīni /
tgt_original: 一切世事者，如金寶工匠一切方術。

src_original: tānyetāni sarvavidyāsthānaparigṛhītāni pañcavidyāsthānāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 方術有五：

src_original: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā vyādhicikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
tgt_original: 一者內術； 二者因術； 三者聲術； 四者知病因治病術；

src_original: itīmāni pañca vidyāsthānāni yāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /  evamanena sarvavidyāsthānāni paryeṣitāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 五者知一切作事。 菩薩摩訶薩常求如是五種方術。

src_original: tatra buddhavacanamadhyātmaśāstramityucyate /
tgt_original: 內術者，謂十二部經。

src_original: samyaghetuphalaparidīpanākāraṃ kṛtāviprahāṇā kṛtānabhyāgamaparidīpanākārañca /
tgt_original: 一者知因果； 二者作業不失、不作不受。

src_original: hetuśāstramapi dvyākāram /  paropāraṃbhakathānuśaṃsaparidīpanākāraṃ parataścetivādavipramokṣānuśaṃsaparidīpanākārañca /
tgt_original: 求因論者為二事故，一者為知外道過故； 二者為壞外道諸論師故。

src_original: śabdaśāstramapi dvyā kāram /  dhāturūpasādhanavyavasthānaparidīpanākāraṃ vāksaṃskārānuśaṃsaparidīpanākārañca /
tgt_original: 求聲論者亦為二事，一者為解一切法界義故； 二者為正一切言辭音聲故。

src_original: cikitsāśāstrañcaturākāraṃ pravartate /  āvādhakośalaparidīpanākaram /  āvādhasamutthānakauśalaparidīpanākāram /
tgt_original: 求治病術為四事故，一者為知病相貌故； 二者為知病因緣故；

src_original: utpannasyāvādhasya prahāṇakauśalaparidīpanākāram /  prahāṇasya cāvādhasyāyatyāmanutpādakauśalaparidīpanākāram /  laukikāni śilpakarmasthānajñānāni
tgt_original: 三者為知病除愈故； 四者為知病愈之後更不起故。

src_original: svakasvakaśilpakarmasthānānuṣṭhānakāryapariniṣpattiparidīpanākārāṇi /  kathañca buddhavacanamaviparītaṃ hetuphalaṃ paridīpayati /  daśeme hetavaḥ aviparītaṃ hetuvyavasthānaṃ sarvahetusaṃgrahe veditavyāḥ saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā laukināmapi ca teṣāṃ sasyādīnāmavyākṛtānāṃ pravṛttaye /
tgt_original: 求十二部經為知因果者，一切法有十種因，說真因相攝一切因，若生死若解脫、若善若不善、若內若外、若眾生若非眾生。

src_original: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahānupāyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksambodheranu prāptaye /  sa cāyamupāyastasmin paramaśūnyatādhimokṣe sanniśritaḥ /  tasmātsā paramanśūyatādhimokṣabhāvanā bodhisattvasya śikṣāmārgasaṃgṛhīto mahānupāya ityucyate yaduta tathāgatajñānādhigamāya /
tgt_original: 善方便者解第一義空，菩薩摩訶薩修集如是第一義空，名菩薩戒大方便也，為得如來無上智故。

src_original: daśa hetavaḥ (Dutt 69) katame /
tgt_original: 何等為十？

src_original: sahavasthāna virodhaḥ /  tadyathā ālokatamaso rāgadveṣayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
tgt_original: 不共住害者，猶如明闇貪恚苦樂。

src_original: vipratyanīkavirodhaḥ /  tadyathā ahinakulayormārjāramūṣikayoranyonyapratyarthikayośca pratyamitrayoḥ /  vipakṣaprātipakṣikaśca virodhaḥ /
tgt_original: 怨害者，如蛇鼠狼馬與水牛、如狸與鼠。

src_original: tadyathā 'śubhabhāvanā-kāmarāgayoḥ maitrībhāvanā-vyāpādayoḥ karuṇābhāvanāvihiṃsayoḥ  bodhyaṅgāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāḥ sarvakleśānāñca traidhātukāvacarāṇām asmiṃstvarthe
tgt_original: 定害者，如不淨觀除貪、慈心除瞋、悲除害心、八聖道分除一切結。

src_original: utpattivirodha evābhipretaḥ /  punaḥ sarveṣāmeṣāṃ hetūnāṃ dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
tgt_original: 復有二因：

src_original: janakena ca hetunā (Dutt 70)  upāyahetunā ca /
tgt_original: 一者真實因； 二者方便因。

src_original: yadākṣepakaṃ nirvartakañca bījaṃ tajjanako hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 真實因者，所謂種子。

src_original: avaśiṣṭā hetava upāyaheturveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 方便因者，如餘外緣。

src_original: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ ālambanapratyayaḥ adhipatipratyayaśca /
tgt_original: 方便因者有四種緣： 一者因緣； 二者次第緣； 三者緣緣； 四者增上緣。

src_original: tatra yo janako hetuḥ saḥ hetupratyayaḥ /
tgt_original: 因緣者，諸法生因。

src_original: yaḥ punarupāyahetuḥ so 'dhipatipratyayo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 增上緣者，謂方便因。

src_original: yāḥ kāñcana saṃvṛtayo hi loke sarvā hi tā munirno upaiti /  anupago hyasau kena upādadīta dṛṣṭaśrute kāntimasaṃprakurvan /
tgt_original: 以是義故，雜藏中說『諸佛世尊不著流布』。

src_original: samanantarapratyayaścālambanapratyayaśca cittacaitasikānāmeva dharmāṇām /
tgt_original: 次第緣、緣緣者，謂心心數法。

src_original: tatra kathamebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ sarvalaukikā bhāvāḥpravartante /
tgt_original: 如是十因，云何出生一切世法及出世法？

src_original: kathamiyaṃ gāthā etamevārthaṃ paridīpayati /  rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni yā rūpamityevamādyāḥ prajñaptayaḥ /
tgt_original: 若見若聞思惟覺知，如色名乃至涅槃名，名為流布。

src_original: yānīmāni vividhāni sasyāni dhānyasaṃkhyātāni loke yairayaṃ loko jīvikāṃ kalpayati  teṣāṃ tāvadyadidaṃ nāma saṃjñā vyāgvyāhāro vividhastad yathā yavaśāligodhūmatilamudgamāṣakulatthādikaḥ /
tgt_original: 如世間中種種穀子，為增長命有種種名，所謂大麥小麥、大豆小豆、粳糧胡麻等，是名流布因。

src_original: cikitsāśāstraṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate sattvānāṃ nānāprakāravyādhivyupaśamanārthaṃ mahājanakāyasyānugrahārtham /  laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'lpakṛcchreṇa bhogasaṃharaṇārthaṃ  sattvānāmarthāya sattvānāñca bahumānotpādanārthaṃ śilpajñānasaṃvibhāgena cānugrahasaṃgrahārtham /
tgt_original: 菩薩何故求世方術？ 為易得財利眾生故、為諸眾生生信心故、為知世事破憍慢故、調伏眾生故、破一切法諸闇障故。

src_original: sarvāṇi ca etāni pañcavidyāsthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhermahājñānasambhāraparipūṇārtham /  na hi sarvatraivamaśikṣamāṇaḥ krameṇa sarvajñajñānamanāvaraṇaṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 若有菩薩不能如是求五事者，終不能得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提成一切智，為得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故求於五事。

src_original: kathañca deśayati /  kimarthañca deśayati /
tgt_original: 說何事？ 云何說？ 何故說？

src_original: tatra yadeva paryeṣate tadeva deśayati /
tgt_original: 說何事者，謂十二部經。

src_original: dvābhyāṃ punarākārābhyāṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 說有二事：

src_original: anulomāṃ ca kathāṃ kathayati pariśuddhāṃ ca /
tgt_original: 一者次第說； 二者清淨說。

src_original: anurūpeṇeryāpithena sthitāya deśayati nāpratirūpeṇa /  na uccatarake āsane niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya nodgunṭhikākṛtāya na purato gacchate vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 清淨說者，人在高處己身處下不應說法，除為病患。 心不信者不應為說，不厭生死者不應為說，人在已前不應為說，人覆頭者不應為說，求過失者不應為說，其餘皆如波羅提木叉修多羅中說。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: dharmaguravo hi buddhabodhisattvāḥ /
tgt_original: 諸佛菩薩恭敬法故。

src_original: arthaṃ pratisaran bodhisattvo na vyañjanaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvasandhyāya-vacanānyanupraviśati /  kālāpadeśamahāpadeśakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ tattvārthānna vicalayituṃ na vikampayituṃ kenacit kathaṃcicchakyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩依義不依字，能知如來甚深之義，知法非法無能動轉。

src_original: tābhiḥ prajñaptibhistasya vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ /
tgt_original: 諸佛世尊終不說言有流布性而生染著。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tasmin dṛṣṭaśrute tṛṣṇāṃ notpādayati na vivardhayati /  nānyatra tenāvalambanena prajahātyupekṣakaśca viharati /  evaṃ kāntiṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 有染著者名為顛倒，如來已斷一切惡見故不染著，以不見不說不染著故名為正見。

src_original: panaścoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃthakātyāyanamārabhya-iha saṃtha bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati /
tgt_original: 是故如來為迦栴延比丘而作是說：

src_original: (Dutt 34) nākāśavijñānākiñcanyanaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ nemaṃ lokaṃ na paraṃ lokaṃ  nobhau sūryācandramasau na dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasānuvitarkitamanuvicāritam /
tgt_original: 我弟子者不著地定、水火風定、空定、識定、無所有定、非有想非無想定，非此世非他世、非日非月、非見非聞、非思非量、非取非得、非覺非觀，是名禪定。

src_original: pṛthivīṃ na niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvat sarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /  iha saṃtha bhikṣoryā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsaṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
tgt_original: 比丘於地不作地相，乃至覺觀不作覺觀相，是則名為不著地定。

src_original: āditaścintāmanupraviśan bodhisattvaḥ apratilabdhapūrvāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate /  tāmeva punaḥ pratilabdhāṃ (Dutt 77)  kṣāntiṃ sāratāmupanayan bodhisattvaḥ bhāvanāma nupraviśati /  ebhiraṣṭābhirākārairbodhisattvaścintāsaṃgṛhītāṃ dharmānudharmapratipatti pratipanno bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是菩薩未得忍者今已得忍，未得三昧今得三昧，是名菩薩如法而住。

src_original: bhāvanā katamā /
tgt_original: 云何名修集？

src_original: samāsataścaturvidhā veditavyā /
tgt_original: 修集有四：

src_original: śamatho vipaśyanā śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaḥ śamathavipaśyanābhiratiśca /  tatra śamathaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者舍摩他； 二者毘婆舍那； 三者愛樂修集； 四者隨所修集樂在中住。

src_original: yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ aṣṭākārāyāśvintāyāḥ susamāptatvānnirabhilāpye vastumātre  'rthamātre ālambane cittamupanibadhya sarvaprapañcāpagatena sarvacittapariplavāpagatena  saṃjñā-manasikāreṇa sarvālambanānyadhimucyamānaḥ adhyātmasamādhinirmitteṣu cittaṃ  saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati vistareṇa yāvadekotīkaroti samādhatte /  ayamucyate śamathaḥ /  vipaśyanā katamā tenaiva punaḥ śamathaparibhāvitena manaskāreṇa yathā cintitānāṃ
tgt_original: 舍摩他者，菩薩摩訶薩修集四禪四無色定，專心緣定能破五蓋，因住定故解真實行，能離一切諸惡覺觀其心不亂，能思內外法界之義隨順法相，心心數法安住一緣，是名舍摩他。

src_original: dharmāṇāṃ nimittamanasikriyā vicayaḥ pravicayo dharmapravicayaḥ vistareṇa yāvatpāṇḍityaṃ prajñācāraḥ /  iyamucyate vipaśyanā /  śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 毘婆舍那者，修舍摩他能觀法界分別法相，求於善法遠離惡法，智慧正見不顛倒見善解於義，是名毘婆舍那。

src_original: yaḥ śamathavipaśyanāyāñca sātatyaprayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayogaśca /  śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ katamā /
tgt_original: 愛樂修集者，至心修集如上二法。

src_original: teṣveva śamathavipaśyanā-nimitteṣu yaccittasyācalanaṃ svarasenaivābhisaṃskāravāhitāsthānaṃ saṃgraho 'visaraṇā /  iyamucyate śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ  tatra bodhisattvo yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaṃ karoti tathā tathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
tgt_original: 至心修者，常不放逸，是名愛樂修集。 樂住修集者，修舍摩他、毘婆舍那時，不假方便，隨意而住，是名樂住修集。

src_original: yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate tathā tathā śamatho vipaśyanā ca pariśudhyataḥ /  yathā yathā śamatho viśudhyati tathā tathā kāyaprasrabdhiścittaprasrabdhiḥ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩常修二法，亦名樂住、亦名清淨、亦名身心寂靜、亦名廣智。

src_original: avavādaḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何為教？

src_original: kathañca bodhisattvaścatvāryapramāṇāni bhāvayati /  maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditāmupekṣām /
tgt_original: 菩薩修集四無量心慈悲喜捨。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ samāsatastrividhāni catvāryapramāṇāni bhāvayati /
tgt_original: 四無量心有三種：

src_original: sattvālambanāni dharmālambanānyanālambanāni ca /
tgt_original: 一者眾生緣； 二者法緣；

src_original: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān  sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ  spharitvā sattvādhimokṣeṇa viharati /
tgt_original: 三者無緣。 眾生緣者，菩薩摩訶薩修集慈心，諦觀一切三聚眾生，一者受樂、二者受苦、三者受不苦不樂。

src_original: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /  iyamasya dharmālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
tgt_original: 法緣者，菩薩摩訶薩唯觀法相不作眾生相。

src_original: yatpunardharmānapyavikalpayaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /
tgt_original: 若我修慈無眾生者，誰得離苦？

src_original: sāsya karuṇā /
tgt_original: 是名法緣。

src_original: sāsya muditā /  sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /  iyamasyopekṣā /  tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /  yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 如慈，餘三無量亦復如是。

src_original: yāni tu bodhisattvasyānālambanānyapramāṇāni tāni sarvatīrthya-śrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /  tatra bodhisattvasya trīṇyapramāṇāni sukhādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /  maitrī karuṇā muditā ca /  ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若因眾生修無量心，當知是心不異外道，亦與聲聞辟支佛共。

src_original: cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃmbodhau pariṇāmayati /  evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto 'pi kṣetrato 'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati  kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati /

src_original: samāsatastrayaḥ puṇyajñānahetavo veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 福因智因有三種。 何等為三？

src_original: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā /
tgt_original: 若近惡友修集邪道行施定慧，名不善福；

src_original: ye 'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham /  yena te vigatanivaraṇā dharmaṃ śrṛṇvanti /  tacca tāvatkālikayogena na tvatyantam dhātuvaiṣamikāṃścaupakramikānamanuṣyābhisṛṣṭāṃścopasargān vyupaśamayati /  tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩說法之時，能令眾生身心安樂壞煩惱障，聽者歡樂如第三禪，四大諸患一時消滅，諸惡鬼等不得其便，是名施眾歡樂。

src_original: idamucyate viparītapratyasānnidhyam /
tgt_original: 破壞如是不善福慧，是名善福。

src_original: teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo 'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ /  eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā /
tgt_original: 若言遠離如是三事得福慧者，無有是處。 是名福德因、智慧因。

src_original: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /  samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti /  te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩放大光明遍照十方無量世界，至地獄中壞地獄苦，至放逸天教修人法令得人身，來至佛所請召十方無量菩薩來集佛所教化眾生，是名放大光明。

src_original: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate /  tasmādeṣā pāriṇāmikī ṛddhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 如是等事名變神通，轉法性故名變神通。

src_original: puṇyajñānaphalaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何名為福果智果？

src_original: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo 'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩成就如是具足福德，不為生死之所沾污，是名為果。

src_original: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam /  apramāṇantve tatprakāraprabhedataḥ /
tgt_original: 四無量心亦是菩薩福果智果。

src_original: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若報因若報果，是名福德福德因福德果，亦名智慧智慧因智慧果。

src_original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā /
tgt_original: 云何名為菩薩檀波羅蜜？

src_original: navākāraṃ dānaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitetyucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩布施有九種： 一者性施； 二者一切施；

src_original: svabhāvadānaṃ sarvadānaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ dānaṃ satpuruṣadānaṃ sarvākāradānaṃ vighātārthikadānamihāmutrasukhaṃ dānaṃ viśuddhadānaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 三者難施； 四者一切自施； 五者善人施； 六者一切行施； 七者為除施；

src_original: kaśca dānasya svabhāvaḥ /  yā cetanā sarvapariṣkāra-svadehanirapekṣasya bodhisattvasya kevalādhyātmikavastuparityāgāya kāyavākkarmānavadyaśca sarvadeyavastuparityāgaḥ
tgt_original: 八者自利利他施； 九者寂靜施。 性施者，自利利他，自他俱利，內發善心，身口意業善，於財物中心無貪著，是名為施。

src_original: iha bodhisattvena prathame 'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /  triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya  paramārthato nirabhilāpyasvabhāve vastunyabhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasya svabhāvasya  lakṣaṇena hetubhāvena cāvidyamānasya tasyaiva saṃkleśātmanāpravṛttitāñcānivṛttitāñcārabhya
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩住初行時，得十行法知諸法義，及知三世不出不滅，過去不出、未來不滅、現在無相，無因緣故不出不滅，是故第一義相不可宣說，不可說法可說流布，雖可流布實無有性，性無相故無因無果，然不可說性、不可說無。 何以故？

src_original: saṃvarasthāyinaḥ āgamadṛṣṭeḥ phaladarśino yo yenārthī tasya ca tadvastupratipādanā bodhisattvasya dānasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩行施，持戒、精進，信十二部經、信因信果，隨諸眾生所求之物心無悋惜，以如是等身口意業施心財物。 如是五事即是五陰，是名性施。

src_original: tatra sarvadānaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何一切施？

src_original: sarvamucyate samāsato dvividhaṃ deyavastu /
tgt_original: 一切施者有二種：

src_original: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyañca /
tgt_original: 一者內物； 二者外物。

src_original: tatra ā majjñaḥ svadehaparityāgo bodhisattvasya kevalādhyātmikavastuparityāga ityucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩於無量世為施眾生受是陰身，是名內物。

src_original: yatpunarbodhisattvo vāntāśināṃ sattvānāmarthe bhuktvā bhuktvā 'nnapānaṃ vamati /  tatsaṃsṛṣṭamādhyātmikabāhyavastudānaṃ bodhisattvasyetyucyate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩為食吐鬼，自服食已吐施於彼，是名內物。

src_original: etadyathoktaṃ sthāpayitvā pariśiṣṭadeyavastuparityāgo bāhyadeyavastuparityāgaḥ evocyate /
tgt_original: 離是二事，是名外施。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dehārthināṃ samāsato dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ svadehamanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩捨身布施有二事：

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma kaścit pareṣāṃ (Dutt 81)  bhaktācchādanahetordāsabhāvamupagacchet /  evameva nirāmiṣacitto bodhisattvaḥ paramabodhikāmaḥ parahitasukhakāmo dānapāramittāṃ paripūrayitukāmo yathākaraṇīyaṃ pareṣāṃ vaśyaṃ paravidheyamātmānaṃ pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 有求不施，不能得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是名菩薩不得自在。 屬他者，菩薩摩訶薩為菩提故，身屬眾生，如世間人以衣食故為他僕使。

src_original: karacaraṇanayanaśiro 'ṅgapratyaṅgārthināṃ māṃsarudhirasnāyvarthināṃ yāvanmajjāyināṃ yāvanmajjānamanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩於自身中不得自在，一切眾生於菩薩身頭目髓腦乃至手足，隨意取用而得自在。

src_original: dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvo bāhyaṃ vastu sattvebhyaḥ parityajati /
tgt_original: 外施有二事： 一者為利眾生；

src_original: kiñca bodhisattvo dvividhādasmādādhyātmikabāhyādvastunaḥ sattvānāṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩於是內外，有施、不施。

src_original: kathaṃ na dadāti /  yadasmādādhyātmikabāhyādvastunaḥ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ sukhāyaiva syānna tu hitāya naiva vāsukhāya nāpi hitāya tadbodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ na dadāti /  yatpunarhitāya syānnāvaśyaṃ sukhāyā-sukhāya vā punarhitāya ca tadvodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /  ityayaṃ tāvaddānasya cādānasya ca samāsanirdeśaḥ /  ataḥ paraṃ vistaravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩觀諸眾生，受施之後不得利樂則不行施，受施之後必得利樂則便行施。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ parotpīḍanāya [paravadhāya] paravañcanāya cāyogavihitena copanimantritamātmānaṃ paravaśyaṃ paravidheyaṃ na dadāti /  apyeva nāma bodhisattvaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ svajīvitaparityāgamapi pareṣāmantikādabhyupagacchet /  natveva rājñayā parārādhanārthaṃ parotpīḍanāṃ paravadhaṃ paravañcanāṃ vā kuryāt /
tgt_original: 菩薩若知緣以身施，令眾生受苦、妨行善法，及非法求，亦不應施。 菩薩摩訶薩若見百千萬億眾生非法因緣，求不得故喪失身命，終不為此而行惠施。 非法求者，所謂若殺若誑若偷若害，是名不施。

src_original: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśayo bhavati dānamārabhya so 'pi sattvakārye prabhūte  karaṇīye pratyupasthite svadehāṅgapratyaṅgayācanake ca pratyupasthite na svadehāṅgapratyaṅgānyanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 復有不施者，菩薩摩訶薩若知自身能多利益無量眾生，有來求者則不應施，是亦名施。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: na hyasya bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya śuddhāśayasya punaḥ kenacitparyāyeṇedaṃ dātavyamasmai dātanyamiti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ /  tasmādasau bodhisattvo yadāśayaśuddhyarthaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadyāt so 'syāśayaḥ śuddha iti na (Dutt 82)  pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadāti /  na ca mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhābhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo dadāti /  mā haiva teṣāmadhimātrā kṣatiścopahatiśca bhaviṣyatīti yathā mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu /  eva tadādiṣṭeṣu sattveṣu veditavyam /
tgt_original: 有淨心故。

src_original: nāpi conmattakṣiptacitteṣu bodhisattvaḥ svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo 'nuprayacchati /  na hi te svacitte 'vasthitāḥ /
tgt_original: 若知是魔及魔眷屬則不應施。

src_original: nārthino mṛgayante /  nānyatra vipralāpaḥ /  sa teṣāmasvatantratvāccetasaḥ tasmānna dadāti /  etānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayāt svadehaṃ tāvadbodhisattvaḥ paravidheyatayā vā 'ṅgapratyaṅgavibhāgaśo vārthibhyaḥ parityajati /
tgt_original: 若有為魔所迷亂者來求索時，亦不應施。 若有狂癡及欲惱亂，如是乞者亦不應施。

src_original: evantāvadbodhisattvasyādhyātmikasya vastuno dānañcādānañca veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是名內不施。

src_original: yāni punarviṣāgniśasramadyānyanugrahāya sattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvo dadātyarthibhya ātmano vā 'nugrahāya yācitānyarthināṃ parānugrahāya vā /
tgt_original: 外不施者，火毒刀酒能為眾生作惡因緣，菩薩終不以此施人；

src_original: nāpi bodhisattvo rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivīmaṇḍale sattvānāṃ saparigrahāṇāṃ parakīyaṃ putradāraṃ pareṣāmantikādācchidya pareṣāmanuprayacchati  nānyatra kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā bhogamanuprayacchet /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩不以父母師長布施，若為國主不應自在取他妻息以施於人，唯除城邑聚落國土。

src_original: yathā mamābhūttathā te bhavatviti /  na ca bodhisattvaḥ svaṃ putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparigrahaṃ samyagasaṃjñaptamakāmakaṃ vimanaskaṃ pareṣāmarthināmanuprayacchati /
tgt_original: 若自妻息及以僮僕眷屬宗族，先以軟語慰喻，其心若不肯者則不應施；

src_original: samyak saṃjñaptamapi ca sumanaskaṃ chandajātaṃ nāmitreṣu na yakṣarākṣaseṣu na raudrakarmasu pratipādayati /
tgt_original: 設其肯者，終不施與怨家惡人、羅剎惡鬼、旃陀羅種。

src_original: tatra nairmāṇikī ṛddhiḥ katamā /
tgt_original: 云何化神通？

src_original: samāsato nirvastukaṃ nirmāṇam /  nirmāṇacittena yathākāmamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ smṛddhyatīyaṃ nairmāṇikī ṛddhirityucyate /  sā cānekavidhā /  kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāḍnirmāṇaṃ viṣayanirmāṇañca /  tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte /
tgt_original: 物無作物故名為化，若化身、若化聲。

src_original: tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye
tgt_original: 以可說故。 若可說性是有相者，是名邪相； 若是有物不可說者，是則無有初中後異。

src_original: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmanastu pareṣāñca sadṛśāsadṛśam /  indriyasabhāgamindriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ nirmimīte na tvindriyam /  viṣayasadṛśamapi nirmāṇaṃ (Dutt 45) nirmimīte /  tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte /  tatpunarātmasabhāgamanekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ devanāga[yakṣā]suragaruḍakinnaramahoragavarṇa
tgt_original: 化身者，或似己身或似他身，有根具足不具足者，餘如轉中。

src_original: paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya tathatā-samyakpraveśanirvikalpasamatayā  ca tatsaṃkleśāpanayanamārabhya /
tgt_original: 以是故一切時中煩惱不行，入正法界無有思惟，心得平等，離疑網故。

src_original: sacedvaisādṛśyena nirmimīte paravisabhāgaṃ bhavati /  yathā devabhūtamevaṃ yāvattathāgatabhūtaṃ veditavyam /  tatra prabhūtakāyanirmāṇaṃ katamat /  iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ  kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate 'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā 'nuvartata eva /
tgt_original: 諸佛菩薩為眾生故，化無量身遍無量界。

src_original: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati /  kiñcitpunarbhūtaṃ bhojanapānayānavastrādimaṇimuktāvaidūryaśaṃkhaśīlāpravāḍādi ca nirmitaṃ bhavati /  tathaiva nānyathā /  idantāvat kāyanirmāṇaṃ viṣayanirmāṇaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 有佛菩薩現遍化身，或有如幻、或有真實，衣食金銀琉璃真珠頗梨珂貝亦復如是，為破眾生貧窮困苦，是名化身。

src_original: vāṅnirmāṇaṃ punarasti susvaratāyuktam /  asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca /  tatra susvaratā /
tgt_original: 化聲者，諸佛菩薩化現好聲、疾聲、妙聲、自說義聲、他說義聲、無義聲、說法聲、教化聲，以是諸聲能壞眾生放逸之心，是名化聲。

src_original: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ /  paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā /  tatra viśadasvaratā /  ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ (Dutt 46)
tgt_original: 佛菩薩聲深遠如雷，如迦陵頻伽聲、人所愛樂聲、遍滿聲、思惟聲、了了聲、易解聲、喜聞聲、無所著聲、無可呵聲、無盡聲。

src_original: sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye 'pi dūre ya 'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ /  ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ sāhasrikacūḍikalokadhātun svareṇa vijñāpayati /  dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /  tasmācca ghoṣādanekaprakārā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā niścarati /  yā sattvānāmarthāya saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩如是諸聲，若三千大千世界所有天眾人眾聲聞眾辟支佛眾菩薩眾，若近若遠悉得聞之，如是聲中出種種法利益眾生。

src_original: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
tgt_original: 自化聲者，如自說法，為放逸眾生故。

src_original: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
tgt_original: 他化聲者，如佛化身為他說法，為放逸眾生故。

src_original: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt /
tgt_original: 無義聲者，如虛空出聲。

src_original: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham /
tgt_original: 說法聲者，為癡眾生故。

src_original: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya /  tadetadanekavidhaṃ nirmāṇam /  samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam /  itīyaṃ nairmāṇikī ṛddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 教化聲者，為放逸者增長不放逸故。

tgt_original: 具足如是十種智已入第八行。

src_original: nāpi ca dāsabhāvāya pratipādayati putradāraṃ sukumāraṃ kulaputraṃ janam /  na ca bodhisattvo 'dhimātraparapīḍāpravṛtteṣu raudrakarmasu yācanakeṣu rājyapradānaṃ dadāti /  rājyādapi ca tāṃstathāvidhān pudgalāṃścyāvayati sa cet pratibalo bhavati cyāvayitum /
tgt_original: 雖以城邑國土聚落惠施於他，終不施與暴惡之人，亦不私以父母師長兄弟妻子僮僕奴婢所有財物布施於人。

src_original: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitrorantikādbhogānācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati /

src_original: ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate /  sā punaḥ katamā /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩住此行時，即得寂靜無生法忍。

src_original: yathā mātāpitrorevaṃ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyebhyaḥ /  nāpi ca (Dutt 84) mātāpitaraṃ bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvatkarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ bādhitvā parebhyo yācanakebhyo deyavastu parityajati /  dharmaṇa cāsāhasena bodhisattvo bhogān saṃhṛtya dānaṃ dadāti nādharmeṇa sāhasena /  na paramutpīḍyopahatya na ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane bodhisattvo vyavasthitaḥ śikṣāṃ vyatikramya kathañcit dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 行施之時於己眷屬不瞋不打不罵不呵，善言教導令其歡喜，如是福報汝亦有分。

src_original: dānañca dadad bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto dadāti dakṣiṇīyabuddhimupasthāpya mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣasatsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu ca /
tgt_original: 菩薩施時其心平等，不觀福田及非福田，不觀怨親種姓尊卑。 已許之物終不生悔，多許之物終不少與，不先許好後以惡施；

src_original: na ca bodhisattvo yathoktādyathāpratijñātādyācanakāya nyūnaṃ dāna dadāti /  nānyatra sama vā adhikaṃ vā /  na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītaṃ vastu pratijñāya lūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ dadāti /  nānyatralūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ pratijñāya praṇītaṃ dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte /
tgt_original: 唯許惡與好、許少施多。

src_original: na ca bodhisattvo vimanasko na kruddhaḥ kṣubhitamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 菩薩施時無不喜心瞋心亂心，施已終不於受者所計於恩報。

src_original: nāpi ca dānaṃ dattvā nindayati punaḥ punaḥ parikīrtanatayā evaṃ caivañca tvaṃ mayā dānenānugṛhītaḥ savardhito 'bhyuddhṛto veti /  na ca bodhisattvo nihīnapuruṣasyāpi dānaṃ dadadapaviddhamasatkṛtyānuprayacchati prāgeva guṇavataḥ /  na ca bodhisattvo vividhavipratipattisthitānāmuddhatānāmasaṃvṛtātmanāṃ
tgt_original: 行施之時不以受者是尊貴故恭敬手奉、受者卑賤撩擲而與。

src_original: yācanakānāmākrośakānāṃ roṣakāṇāṃ paribhāṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattyā khinnamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /  nānyatra teṣāmevāntike bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśāveśaprakṛtitāmavagamyānukampācittamupasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 若其受者打罵劫奪，菩薩於是終不生瞋，但責煩惱不訶其人，於是人所深生憐愍。

src_original: na cāsaddṛṣṭyā parāmṛṣṭaṃ [dānaṃ] dadāti /
tgt_original: 終不念言： 『因是施故我當得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tadyathā mahāraudrayajñeṣu na hiṃsādānena dharmaṃ pratyeti /  nāpi kautakamaṅgalapratisaṃyuktaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /  nāpi suviśuddhenāpi sarvākāreṇa dānamātrakeṇa laukikalokottarāṃ vairāgyaviśuddhiṃ pratyeti nānyatra /  saṃbhāramātrakatayā viśuddherdānaṃ dhārayati /  na ca phaladarśī dadāti /
tgt_original: 』是施亦能莊嚴菩提，不為求果故而行於施。

src_original: sarvañca dānamanuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 一切所施悉以迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: sarvaprakārasya dānasya sarvaṃ prakāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ phalaṃ vipāke 'bhisaṃpratyayajāto bodhisattvo 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyo dānaṃ dadāti tadyathā 'nnado balavān bhavati /
tgt_original: 不為他教故行於布施，不以聞有施果報故而行於施。

src_original: vastrado varṇavān yānadaḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpada ityevamādi vistareṇa veditavyam /
tgt_original: 如經中說： 『施食得力、施衣得色、施乘者得樂、施燈得好眼、施房舍者得隨意物。

src_original: na ca bodhisattvo dāridryabhayabhīto dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 』終不悕得如是等果而行布施，唯以憐愍而行於施、為破貧窮故而行於施、為調眾生阿耨多羅三藐三菩提故而行於施。 不施非施。

src_original: na ca bodhisattvo yācanakānāmapratirūpaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 非施者，不以殘食以施聖人，非聖人者不求不施。 不以殘食施於父母師長耆宿有德之人，如其求者則應施之。

src_original: tadyathā yatīnāmucchiṣṭaṃ vā pānabhojanamuccāraprasrāvakheṭaśiṃghāṇakavāntaviriktapūyarudhiṃrasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ (Dutt 85)
tgt_original: 終不以吐膿汗涕唾糞土雜食而以施人，不以穢食而以施人。

src_original: vā abhidūṣitaṃ vā /  anākhyātamapratisaṃveditamodanakulmāṣamutsarjanadharmī / tathā  apalāṇḍubhakṣāṇāṃ palāṇḍusaṃmiśraṃ palāṇḍusaṃsṛṣṭam /
tgt_original: 凡所施食若多若少，先語後施，不語不施。 不食葱者不以雜葱食施，不食肉者不以雜肉食施，不飲酒者不以雜酒食施，若有酒香亦不以施，是名不淨之物不以布施。

src_original: na [ca] parataḥ pratikārasanniśritaṃ na śakratvamāratvacakravartitvaiśvaryasanniśritaṃ [dadāti] /  kaccinmāṃ pare rājāno vā rājamahāmātyā vā naigamajanapadā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhā dātāraṃ dānapatiṃ viditvā satkuryurgurūkuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuriti /  na ca kārpaṇyadānaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 不為天樂而行布施，不以名稱而行布施，不求恩報而行布施，不以轉輪聖王身故而行布施，不以魔天梵天身故而行布施，不為國王長者恭敬供養尊重而行布施。

src_original: alpādapi viśadaṃ dadāti prāgeva prabhūtāt /
tgt_original: 少物尚施，何況有多。

src_original: na ca pareṣāṃ vipralambhāya dānaṃ dadāti /  anena dānena vilobhya viśrambhayitvā paścādenaṃ vipravādayiṣyāmīti /  na ca vibhedāya parataḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /  tadyathā dānena grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā vibhedya svāmināmantikādācchetsyāmyākramiṣyāmīti /
tgt_original: 不為誑故而行布施，不為壞他眷屬、成己眷屬，乃至聚落城邑國土而行布施。

src_original: dakṣaśca bodhisattvo bhavatyanalasaśca utthānasampannaḥ svayaṃ ca sannaddhaḥ parikare  pūrvaṅgamo deyavastu parityāge svayañca dadāti paraiśca dāpayati na svayaṃ kausīdyaṃ  mahāntamapi gaṇasannipātamarthināṃ śīlavadduḥśīlānāṃ sanniṣaṇṇaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā  vṛddhāntamupādāya yāvannavakāntaṃ tatsarvaṃ deyavastu gatapratyāgatikatayā punaḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩施時手奉上座，乃至沙彌及持戒毀戒心無疲厭。

src_original: kathañca punarna dadāti /  na khalu punarbodhisattvaḥ utsahate yācanakaṃ niṣṭhurayā vācā pratikṣeptum /  na te dāsyāmītyapi upāyakauśalyanainaṃ saṃjñapyānupreṣayati /
tgt_original: 復次菩薩於不求者強以物施，若無財物應以方便役力求覓而行惠施。 若無財施應行法施教化眾生： 『汝今何故不行惠施？

src_original: sa tān deyadharmān buddhabodhisattvanikṣiptāniva dhārayati /
tgt_original: 『我今所有之物，當施十方諸佛菩薩及諸眾生。

src_original: sa nāsti tat kiñcid buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yatsattveṣu aparityaktamiti viditvā yācanakasyecchāṃ paripūrayati /  no cedyuktarūpaṃ samanupaśyati sa tameva kalpamupādāya parakīyametad bhadramukha na caitadyuṣmākamanujñātaṃ dātumiti ślakṣnena vacasā saṃjñapyainaṃ preṣayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩亦爾，所有之物奉施諸佛及諸菩薩，諸佛菩薩雖不受取，亦令施者得無量福，常隨菩薩如恒河沙。 菩薩摩訶薩觀己財物，如十方佛菩薩所寄，知佛菩薩於是物所心無慳悋，是故菩薩自在隨意以施眾生。

src_original: yenāsau jānīte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo lobhātmakatayā 'smākaṃ na dātukāmaḥ /  api tu nūnamasvatantra evaṃ tasmin pustakadharmadāne yena na dadātīti /
tgt_original: 『如此物者實非我有，乃是諸佛菩薩所有。 』以柔軟語曉喻求者不令瞋恨。

src_original: idamapi bodhisattvasya dharmadānamārabhya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩成就具足財法二施。

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadānāni dharmāmiṣābhaya[dānā]ni praryāyato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pi nirvacanato 'pi hetuphalaprabhedato 'pi yathābhūtaṃ prajānannanuprayacchati /  idamapi bodhisattvasya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 具二施已，知性、知因知果、知分別。

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitryāśayo dānaṃ dadāti /  duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩若施於怨憎者，慈因緣故。 若施苦者，悲因緣故。

src_original: guṇavatsu muditāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 若施有德者，喜因緣故。

src_original: (Dutt 90) upakāriṣu mitreṣu suhṛtsūpekṣāśayaḥ /
tgt_original: 若施眷屬兄弟僮僕，捨因緣故。

src_original: idamapi bodhisattvasya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩因智慧施。

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo dānavibandhanamapi dānavibandhapratipakṣamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 「復次菩薩知害施心。

src_original: tatra catvāro dānavibandhāḥ /
tgt_original: 害施心者有四種：

src_original: pūrvako 'nabhyāsaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者無量世來不習施故；

src_original: deyadharmaparīttatāvaikalyam /
tgt_original: 二者財物少故；

src_original: agre manorame ca vastuni gṛddhiḥ āyatyāñca bhogasampatti phaladarśanābhinandanatā /
tgt_original: 三者貪著好物故； 四者不求後世善果報故。

src_original: yataśca bodhisattvasya deyadharmeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu yācanake ca samyagupasthite dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /  so 'nabhyāsakṛto me 'yaṃ doṣa iti laghu ladhveva prajñayā pratisidhyati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩見來求者富有財物，不即發施心，是則菩薩無量世來不習施心。

src_original: nūnaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ dānaṃ na dattaṃ yena me etarhi samyak saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu samyak pratyupasthite ca yācanake dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /  sa cedetarhina pratisaṃkhyāya dāsyāmi punarapi me āyatyāṃ dānavidveṣo bhaviṣyati /  sa eva pratibidhya dānapratibandhapratipakṣa niśṛtya pratisaṃkhyāya dadāti /  nābhyāsakṛtadoṣānusārī bhavati na tadvaśagaḥ /
tgt_original: 『以我從昔無量世來不習施故不即發心。 我於今者多有財物兼有求者，若不惠施，於未來世復當增長慳悋之心，終不隨順不修施心。

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa cedyad yācanake samyak pratyupasthite parīttabhogatayā  dāne cittaṃ na krāmati sa ta vighātakṛta dānavipratibandhahetuṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā  pratividhya tadvighātakṛtaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayan pratisaṃkhyāya kāruṇyāddānaṃ dadāti /  tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 』復次菩薩見來求者財物少故，不即發施心，菩薩復應以智慧力而自思惟：

src_original: pūrvakarmadoṣeṇa vā paravineyatayā vā mayā bahūni pragāḍhāni kṣut pipāsādikāni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni bhave vinā parānugraham /
tgt_original: 『我以無量惡業因緣，無量世中身屬於他，受大苦惱飢渴寒熱，不能利益無量眾生，以是業緣令身少財。

src_original: yadi ca me maraṇāya kālakriyāyai savarteta etaddānakṛta parānugrahahetuka dṛṣṭe dharme duḥkha tathāpi me dānameva śreyo na tu yācanakanirākaraṇam  prāgeva yaḥ kaścidyena kenacicchākapatreṇa jīvati ityevaṃ bodhisattvastadvighātakṛtaṃ dukhamadhivāsya dāna dadāti /
tgt_original: 今若不施，復增來世貧窮困苦。 我今以是少物施人，雖當貧苦，終不至於三惡道苦。 』作是思惟，能壞少物慳悋之心。

src_original: panarapara bodhisattvasya samyag yācake pratyupasthite sa cedadhimātramanāpatvādagryatvāddeyavastuno  dāne citta na krāmati ta bodhisattvo gardhakṛt doṣa laghu-laghveva pratijñayā pratividhya
tgt_original: 復次菩薩見有求者，於好物中心生貪著不即發施心，菩薩爾時應以智慧而自思惟：

src_original: prahāya prati saṃkhyāya tadvastu dadāti /  punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa ceddānaṃ dattvā dānaphale (Dutt 91)  mahābhogatāyāmanuśaṃsadarśanamutpadyate nānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taṃ bodhisattvo
tgt_original: 』是故菩薩能壞貪著好物之心。 復次菩薩不求果報故不行布施，菩薩爾時應思惟言：

src_original: prativedho duḥkhādivāsanā viparyāsaparijñānaṃ saṃskārāsāratvadarśanañca /  tatra trividhena bodhisattvaḥ pratipakṣajñānena pūrvakeṇa niyataṃ samyak ca dānaṃ dadāti /  ekena paścimena pratipakṣajñānena samyak puṇyaphalaparigrahaṃ karoti /  idamapi bodhisattvasya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩知四顛倒，法無決定無有常相，是故能壞四怨惡心。

src_original: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ adhyātmyaṃ rahogataḥ śuddhenāśayena ghanarasena prasādena
tgt_original: 復次菩薩內身寂靜至心思惟，常作是念：

src_original: yena bodhisattvaḥ alpakṛcchreṇāprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate /  idamapi bodhisattvasya prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /  tadidaṃ bodhisattvasya prājñasya [mahā]prājñadānam /  dharmadānamupādāya pratisaṃvidamupādāyādhyāśayadānamupādāya dānavipratibandhapratipakṣajñānamupādāyāśayādhimuktidānañcopādāya  bodhisattvasyaivāveṇikaṃ veditavyam /  evaṃ hi bodhisattvasyādhyātmika-bāhyasarvavastudānaprabhedo vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 』是名菩薩智慧布施。

src_original: ata ūrdhvamasmādeva sarvadānaprabhedāttadanyaḥ sarvo duṣkarādidānaprabhedo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 有財無財常作如是繫心思惟，法施亦爾，是名一切施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya duṣkaradānam /
tgt_original: 「云何菩薩難施能施。

src_original: yadbodhisattvaḥ parīttaṃ deyavastu saṃvidyamānamātmānaṃ bādhitvā duḥkhamadhivāsya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /  idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ duṣkaradānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若有少物，常以惠施，是名難施。

src_original: yadbodhisattvaḥ iṣṭañca vastu prakṛtisnehādvā dīrghakāla saṃstavādvā 'dhimātropakārādvā 'gryañca pravaraṃ deyavastugardhaṃ prativinodya parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /  (Dutt 92) idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīyaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ yadbodhisattvaḥ kṛcchatārjitān deyadharmān parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /  idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bodhisattvasya duṣkaradānam /
tgt_original: 心所愛重貪著之物，無量世中勤求得者，及大方便役力得者，以如是等惠施他人，是名難施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya sarvatomukhaṃ dānam /
tgt_original: 云何一切自施？

src_original: yathā pṛthivyāmevamagnāvapsu vāyau rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu bhojane  āloke strīpuruṣaparicaryāyāṃ kṣetrāpaṇagṛhavastuni sukhaduḥkhe duḥkhamidaṃ na sukhaṃ  sukhamidaṃ na duḥkhamiti /
tgt_original: 世間之法同其名號，眾生見地真實是地終不言火，火真實火不言是地，水風、色聲香味觸、衣服飲食瓔珞器物伎樂明闇、男女舍宅田業苦樂，苦真實苦終不言樂，樂真實樂終不言苦。

src_original: yadbodhisattvaḥ svakaṃ vā paraṃ vā samādāpya deyavastu svabhṛtyeṣu vā mātāpitṛputradāradāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyamitrāmātyajñātisālohiteṣvanuprayacchati  pareṣu vā 'rthiṣu /  etatsarvatomukhaṃ dānamityucyate /  samāsato bodhisattvasya caturākāraṃ satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若自行施、若教父母兄弟妻子眷屬奴婢令行布施，是名一切自施。

src_original: tava katamad bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānam /
tgt_original: 云何善人施？

src_original: yadbodhisattvaḥ śraddhayā dānaṃ dadāti satkṛtya svahastena kālena parānanupahatya idaṃ bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 若善男子以善心施、信心施、至心施、自手施、應時施、如法得財施，是名善人施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya sarvākāraṃ dānam /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩一切行施？

src_original: aniścitadānatā /  viśadadānatā /  pramuditadānatā /  abhīkṣṇadānatā /
tgt_original: 不求果報故，名一切行施。 常施故，名一切行施。

src_original: pātradānatā /  apātradānatā sarvadānatā /  sarvatradānatā /  sarvakāladānatā /  anavadyadānatā sarvavastudānatā /  deśavastudānatā /
tgt_original: 福田施故，名一切行施。 不觀福田及非福田施故，是名一切行施。 不觀時與非時，是名一切行施。

src_original: dhanadhānyavastudānatā /  itīda trayodaśākāraṃ dānaṃ bodhisattvasya sarvākāramityucyate /
tgt_original: 不觀財物是可施是不可施，是名一切行施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya vighātārthika dānam /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩為除故施？

src_original: iha bodhisattvo bhojanena pānena vighātiṣvarthikeṣu bhojanapānaṃ dadāti /  yānārthikeṣu yānaṃ vastrārthikeṣu vastramalaṅkārārthikeṣu alaṃkāraṃ vicitrabhāṇḍopaskārārthikeṣu vicitrabhāṇḍopaskāraṃ dadāti /  gandhamālyavilepanārthikeṣu gandhamālyavilepanam /  pratiśrayārthikeṣu pratiśrayam /  idamaṣṭākāra bodhisattvasya vighātārthikadānaṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 若有眾生飢渴苦惱，為除此事而行布施，寒者施衣、求乘施乘、求瓔珞者施以瓔珞，塗香末香雜華燈明、房舍臥具病瘦醫藥亦復如是，是名為除故施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasyehāmutrasukhaṃ dānam /
tgt_original: 云何自利利他施？

src_original: āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānamabhayadānañca samāsataḥ ihāmutrasukhaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānaṃ veditavyam /  tatpunarāmiṣadānaṃ praṇītaṃ śucikalpikam /  vinīya mātsaryamalaṃ sannidhimalañca dadāti /  tatra mātsaryamalavinayaścittāgrahaparityāgāt sannidhimalavinayo bhogāgrahaparityāgādveditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若以財法施於彼者，能為己身及以眾生作二世樂。

src_original: abhayadānaṃ siṃhavyādhragrāharājacaurodakādibhayaparitrāṇatayā veditavyam /
tgt_original: 常施眾生無畏之樂，所謂虎狼師子水火王難怨賊能為救濟，是名無畏施。

src_original: dharmadānamaviparītadharmadeśanā nyāyopadeśaḥ śikṣāpadasamādāpanā (Dutt 93) ca /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩法施者，凡有所說初無顛倒，是名法施。 善能教誡一切眾生，是名淨法施。

src_original: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya navākāraṃ bodhisattvasya dānaṃ sattvānābhihāmutrasukhaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩財施利益現在，行法施者則能利益現在他世。 復有財施，或為眾生作現世苦； 法施不爾，能作現在他世樂事。 財施不淨，法施清淨。 行財施者不名無邊，法施之施名無邊施。

src_original: tatrāmiṣābhayadānaṃ saprabhedabhihasukham dharmadānaṃ punaḥ saprabhedamamutrasukham /
tgt_original: 財施易得，法施難遇。 是名自他利施。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya viśuddhaṃ dānam /
tgt_original: 云何名寂靜施？

src_original: taddaśākaraṃ veditavyam /
tgt_original: 寂靜施者有十種。 何等為十？

src_original: tatrāsaktaṃ dānaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 五者無著心施；

src_original: samāsata idamidaṃ nedam /  evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā svavikalpa-prasidvaṃ na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam  idamucyate lokaprasiddhatattvam /
tgt_original: 此是此非定以不定，一切世間從昔已來傳此名相自然而知，不從修集然後知也，是名世流布真實義也。

src_original: iha bodhisattvo yācanake samyak pratyupasthite tvaritamavilambitaṃ dadāti /
tgt_original: 六者無羞施； 七者無愁施； 八者無䫌面施； 九者無求恩報施； 十者不求果報施無礙施者。 菩薩摩訶薩行施之時，不為一切勮務世事之所障礙，雖知求者心無悒遲，然能疾捨稱其所求，是名無礙施。

src_original: saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
tgt_original: 三者為利眾生故行戒。

src_original: tatra saṃvaraśīlaṃ bodhisattvasya katamat /
tgt_original: 云何名戒？

src_original: yatsaptanairṇāyikaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇī-śikṣamāṇā-śrāmaṇera-śramaṇeryyupāsakopāsikāśīlam /
tgt_original: 所謂七眾戒： 比丘、比丘尼、式叉摩那、沙彌、沙彌尼、優婆塞、優婆夷。

src_original: tatra kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ yatkiñcidbodhisattvaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānādūrdhvaṃ  mahābodhāya kuśalamācinoti kāyena vācā manasā sarvaṃ tatsamāsataḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /  tatpunaḥ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何名受善法戒？ 善法戒者，菩薩摩訶薩離七種戒，為菩提故修身口意十種善法，是名受善法戒。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śrute yogaṃ karoti cintāyāṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāmekārāmatāyām /  tathā gurūṇāmabhivādana-vandana pratyutthānāñjalikarmaṇaḥ kālena kālaṃ kartā bhavati /  tathā kālena kālaṃ teṣāmeva gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasya kartā bhavati /  glānānāṃ satkṛtya kāruṇyena glānopasthānasya kartā bhavati tathā subhāṣite sādhukārasya dātā bhavati /  guṇavatāṃ pudgalānāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā bhavati /
tgt_original: 身口意者，若菩薩摩訶薩住戒地已，讀誦書寫分別解說，思惟修集舍摩他、毘婆舍那，恭敬供養尊重讚歎師長和上耆舊有德，時時供給瞻視走使，若病若老、或道路疲頓代擔衣鉢，若見說法及經唄者稱歎善哉，見持戒者盡力擁護讚歎於戒，願諸眾生悉持淨戒。

src_original: tathā sarvaṃ kāyena vācā manasā kṛtaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 身口意業所作諸善，悉發誓願迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: kālena ca kālaṃ vicitrāṇāṃ samyak praṇidhānānāṃ triratnapūjāyāśca sarvākārāyā udārāyāḥ kartā (Dutt 97) bhavati /  abhiyuktaśca bhavatyārabdhavīryaḥ satatasamitaṃ kuśalapakṣe /  apramādavihārī kāyena vācā /
tgt_original: 隨身口意有氣力時，懃心供養佛法僧寶，為增善法懃修精進，為得一切諸善法故修不放逸。

src_original: śikṣāpadānāṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyacārikayā cārakṣakaḥ /  indriyaiśca guptadvāro bhojane mātrajñaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktaḥ satpuruṣasevī kalyāṇamitrasanniśritaḥ ātmaskhalitānāñca parijñātā bhavati doṣadarśī /  parijñāya ca doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃhartā bhavati /  skhalitaśca buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sahadhārmikāṇāṃ cāntike 'tyayadeśako bhavati /  evaṃbhāgīyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇavivardhanāya yacchīlaṃ [tad] bodhisattvasya kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
tgt_original: 常當至心念戒護戒調伏諸根，飲食知足不樂眠臥，初夜後夜讀誦經典，憶念三寶親近善友，樂聞其說自省己過，知已懺悔深生慚愧，至心憶念更不毀犯，向佛法僧同師同法同戒同學發露懺悔，是名受善法戒。

src_original: tatra katamad bodhisattvasya sattvānugrāhakaṃ śīlam /  tatsamāsata ekādaśākāraṃ veditavyam /  ekādaśākārāḥ katame /
tgt_original: 為利眾生行戒者，有十一種。

src_original: sattvakṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣu [vicitreṣu] sahāyībhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有眾生欲修善者，即往勸喻，共為伴侶共作善業。

src_original: tathā laukikalokottareṣvartheṣu dharmadeśanāpūrvaka upāyopadeśapūrvakaśca nyāyopadeśaḥ /
tgt_original: 若有眾生欲解世法出世法義，即以方便而為解說。

src_original: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajñatāmanurakṣato 'nurūpa[pratyupakāra-]pratyupasthānam /  vivighebhyaśca siṃhavyāghrarājacaurodakāgnyādikebhyo vicitrebhyo bhayasthānebhyaḥ sattvānāmārakṣā /  bhogajñātivyasaneṣu śokavinodanā /
tgt_original: 有受恩處念欲酬報。 酬報者，所謂堅持禁戒，讀誦書寫十二部經，思惟正義分別解說。 能救眾生種種恐怖，所謂師子虎狼水火王賊，擁護眾生令得遠離如是等畏。

src_original: iha bodhisattvaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaravyavasthitaḥ sa ceccakravartirājyamapyutsṛjya pravrajito bhavati sa tasmiṃścakravartirājye evaṃ nirapekṣo bhavati tadyathā tṛṇe vā 'medhye vā /  nihīnapuruṣasya jīvikābhiprāyasya pravrajitasya pratyavarān kāmānapahāya na tathā  teṣu pratyavareṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasyāśayaviśuddhatāmupādāya
tgt_original: 若有菩薩捨轉輪王位，出家學道受解脫戒，放捨五欲如棄涕唾，不念不求不生悔惜，乃至天上五欲之樂亦復如是。

src_original: pravrajitasya sarvamānuṣyakakāmapravareṣu cakravartikāmeṣu /  anāgateṣvapi mārabhavanaparyāpanneṣvapi kāmeṣu bodhisattvo nābhinandī bhavati nāpi  ca teṣāmarthāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati mahāvicitrapratibhayagahanapraveśamiva  tān kāmān yathābhūtaṃ saṃpaśyan prāgeva tadanyeṣu divyeṣu /
tgt_original: 不為人天受快樂故受持禁戒，觀五欲樂如火毒蛇、如三惡趣，得他供養觀如吐食心不貪著。

src_original: sa na śīlasaṃvaramātrakeṇa tuṣṭho bhavati /
tgt_original: 若有於戒生知足者，當知是人不名持戒。

src_original: api tu śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya ye te 'prameyā bodhisattvasamādhayasteṣāmabhinirhārāya vaśitāprāptaye vyāyacchate /
tgt_original: 知因戒故得諸菩薩無量三昧，若無戒者則不增長無量三昧，為三昧故護持禁戒。

src_original: vayamapi manuṣyabhūtāḥ krameṇa ca śikṣamāṇāḥ asaṃśayamanuprāpsyāmastāṃ kāyavāksaṃvarasampattimiti /  ātmadoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī ca bodhisattvo bhavati śīlasaṃvare vyavasthito na paradoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī /  sattvānāmantike nāghātacitto bhavati na pratighacittaḥ /
tgt_original: 我今此身亦是眾生，亦有五陰，亦具煩惱，亦受菩薩戒修集菩提，亦應當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，我亦能調身口意惡，必亦當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: dharmamahākaruṇatāmupādāyādhimātrameva teṣāmantike bodhisattvānāmanukampācittañca kartukāmatācittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /  saṃvaraśīlavyasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrasaṃsparśairapi pareṣāmantike cittamapi na pradūṣayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩受持菩薩戒者，至心專念自省己過不訟彼短，見行惡者心不瞋恨，見破戒者心生憐愍無有瞋惱。

src_original: kutaḥ punaḥ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayiṣyati pratihaniṣyati vā prāgeva punaḥ ākrośaroṣaṇaparibhāṣaṇaistanukaduḥkhasparśajairapakāraiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩受持菩薩戒者，若為惡人之所打擲、手拳刀杖惡聲罵詈，於是人所不起惡心麁言加報。

src_original: saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pañcāṅgaparigṛhītenāpramādena samanvāgato  bhavati pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca /  bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ atītamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpannaḥ sā 'nena yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩若學菩薩戒者，有五不放逸：

src_original: ayamasya pūrvāntasahagato 'pramādaḥ /  anāgate 'pyadhvani yāmāpattimāpatsyate tāmapi yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyati /  ayamasyāparāntasahagato 'pramādaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者觀已犯罪如法懺悔； 二者觀當犯罪如法懺悔；

src_original: pratyutpanne 'pyadhvani yāmāpattimāpadyate tāmapi yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti /  ayamasya madhyāntasahagato 'pramādaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者觀現犯罪如法懺悔；

src_original: pūrvameva cāpatterbodhisattvastīvramautsukyamāpadyate /  kaccidahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ yathā yathā caran yathā yathā viharan āpattiṃ nāpadyeyam /
tgt_original: 四者至心堅持不作犯想；

src_original: ayamasya sahānucaro 'pramādaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名五不放逸。

src_original: saṃvaraśīla-vyavasthito bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati vivṛtapāpaḥ alpecchaḥ  santuṣṭaḥ duḥkhasahiṣṇuraparitasanajātīyaḥ anuddhataśca acapalaśca praśānteryāpathaḥ  kuhanādisarvamithyājīvakarakadharmavivarjitaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩受持菩薩戒者，所有功德應當覆藏，諸所犯罪應當發露，少欲知足堪忍眾苦，常樂寂靜心無悔恨，不自高不輕躁，修寂滅行及微細行破壞邪命。

src_original: ebhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就如是法者，是名菩薩住菩薩戒。

src_original: yadutātīteṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatayā anāgateṣvanabhinandanatayā pratyutpa-nneṣvanadhyavasānatayā
tgt_original: 菩薩受學菩薩戒者，不念過去五欲之樂，不求未來五欲之樂，於現在五欲心不生著，常樂寂靜破惡覺觀，成就具足不放逸行。

src_original: sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati adhvagamanāgamane samyakkarmāntaprayoge bhogānāmārakṣaṇe vibhinnānyo  'nyapratisandhāne utsave puṇyakriyāyāñca duḥkheṣu vā /  punarbodhisattvaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan vyādhitān sattvān paricarati /
tgt_original: 菩薩受持利益他戒故，教化眾生令行善業，共修善者而為伴侶，常教眾生供養三寶。 若見離別，以善方便還令和合。 見有病苦，身自供給。

src_original: andhān praṇayati panthānaṃ vyapadiśati /  badhirān hastasavācikayārthaṃ grāhayati saṃjñānimittavyapadeśena /
tgt_original: 見盲瞽者，供給所須衣服飲食，示導徑路善為說法。

src_original: vyaṅgān śirasā vā yānena vā vahati /
tgt_original: 見有躄者，施其車乘，若無車乘身自荷負。

src_original: kāmacchandaparyavasthānaduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāmacchandaparyavasthānaduḥkhaṃ prativinodayati /
tgt_original: 見有貪者，以貪受苦，能為說法令除貪苦。

src_original: prativinodayati /  adhvapariśrāntānāṃ sthānāsanadānenāṅgaprapīḍanena śramaklamaduḥkhaṃ prativinodayati /
tgt_original: 行路疲乏代其擔負，施以水漿床褥所須調身按摩。

src_original: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ /  katamaiścaturbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩若能具足四事，得四陀羅尼。

src_original: anīrṣurbhavati sarva-yācita-pradaśca bhavatyananutāpyadāyī /
tgt_original: 三者能施施已無悔；

src_original: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā
tgt_original: 四者樂聞正法受持讀誦書寫解說菩薩法藏、菩薩摩夷。

src_original: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvapraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩發大誓願？

src_original: tat samāsataḥ pañcavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam /
tgt_original: 有五種：

src_original: cittotpādapraṇidhānaṃ upapattipraṇidhānaṃ gocarapraṇidhānaṃ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ mahāpraṇidhānañca /
tgt_original: 一者發心發願； 二者有發願； 三者行發願； 四者善發願； 五者大發願。

src_original: tatra prathamacittotpādo bodhisattvasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittotpādapraṇidhānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 初發菩提心時名發心發願；

src_original: āyatyāṃ sattvārthānukūlāsu sugatyupapattiṣu praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasyopapattipraṇidhānamityucyate /  (Dutt 187)
tgt_original: 為利眾生生人天故名有發願；

src_original: samyagdharmapravicayapraṇidhānaṃ apramāṇādikuśaladharmabhāvanā-viṣaya-praṇidhānañca bodhisattvasya gocarapraṇidhānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 為眾生故修無量心名行發願；

src_original: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate /  mahāpraṇidhānaṃ punarbodhisattvasattvasyāsmādeva samyakpraṇidhānādveditavyam /
tgt_original: 修集一切菩薩善法名善發願； 不惜身命護持正法名大發願。

src_original: tat punardaśaviṃdham /  āyatyāṃ sarvākārāprameya-tathāgata-pūjopasthānatāyai prathamaṃ praṇidhāna bodhisattvasya mahāpraṇidhānamityucyate /  buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ saddharma-parigrahārakṣaṇatāyai dharmanetrīsandhāraṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩若以十種供養佛法僧寶護持正法，見持法者供養恭敬，是名大發願。

src_original: tuṣitabhavanavāsamupādāya purvavadyāvat parinirvāṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩生兜率天乃至大涅槃，是名大發願。

src_original: bodhisattva-sarvākārasamyakcaryācaraṇatāyai mahāpraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩從初發心乃至得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，是名大發願。

src_original: sarvasattvaparipākāya mahāpraṇidhānam /  sarvalokadhātusandarśanāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩為度眾生遍在諸有隨而受身，是名大發願。

src_original: buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya mahāpraṇidhānam /  sarvabodhisattvaikāśayaprayogatāyai mahāyānāvataraṇatāyai mahāpraṇidhānam /  abandhyasarva-samyakprayogatāyai mahāpraṇidhānam /  anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyabhisaṃbodhāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩常以大乘菩薩法藏、菩薩摩夷教化眾生，是名大發願。 菩薩摩訶薩凡所演說無不利益，無善根者令生善芽，是名大發願。

src_original: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya śūnyatāsamādhiḥ /
tgt_original: 云何名為菩薩摩訶薩修空三昧？

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ /  ayamasyocyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩深觀一切諸法有可說性，是可說性不可說性中無，故名空三昧。

src_original: apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何無願三昧？

src_original: prasādhitaṃ vyavasthāpitam /  idamucyate yuktiprasiddhaṃ tattvam /
tgt_original: 如世智人先以籌量，然後造作經書論議，是名方便流布。

src_original: ayamasyāpraṇihitaḥ samādhirityucyate /
tgt_original: 無我無我所故更不願求，是名無願三昧。

src_original: animittaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ /
tgt_original: 云何無相三昧？

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ  ayamasyocyate animittaḥ samādhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩知一切法不可宣說，以不可說故悉無一切煩惱之相，以無相故名為寂靜，修寂靜故是名無相三昧。

src_original: kasmātpunareṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ prajñaptirbhavati /
tgt_original: 如來何故說三三昧？

src_original: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā /  tatraḥ (Dutt 188) saṃskṛte satyapraṇidhānataḥ prātikūlyato 'praṇihitasamādhivyavasthānam /
tgt_original: 一者有為有； 二者無為有。 有為有者謂我我所，無為有者所謂涅槃。 有為有者，菩薩摩訶薩觀一切苦不生願求，是名無願三昧。

src_original: asaṃskṛte punarnirvāṇe praṇidhānataḥ samyagabhiratigrahaṇato nirnimittasamādhivyavasthānam /
tgt_original: 無為有者所謂涅槃，菩薩摩訶薩於涅槃中不生樂想，是名無想。

src_original: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
tgt_original: 無為者亦有亦無，是故菩薩非願非不願。

src_original: api tu tadasadasadityeva yathābhūtaṃ draṣṭavyam /  tacca darśanamadhikṛtya śūnyatāsamādhivyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /  evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩見有有、見無無，有中無無、無中無有，是名為空。

src_original: evaṃ ca vyavasthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /  tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca /  catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /  katamāni catvāri /
tgt_original: 菩薩爾時修空三昧得真實智，如是三昧聲聞緣覺亦修亦學而不能說。

src_original: kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何淨煩惱障？

src_original: anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti dharmoddānam /  duḥkhāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti dharmoddānam /  anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmoddānam /  śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti dharmoddānam /
tgt_original: 一切諸法不可宣說，諸佛菩薩為令眾生得寂靜故說是四法，一切有為法無常、苦、無我、涅槃寂靜。

src_original: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /  tasmādetāni dharmoddānānītyucyante /
tgt_original: 諸佛菩薩為諸眾生說是四法，當知已說一切法界諸法根本，是名優陀那。

src_original: paurāṇeśca śāntamānasairmunibhiruditoditatvānnityakālamuddānānītyucyante /
tgt_original: 優陀那者，過去無量一切諸佛亦如是說。

src_original: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /  iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩見有為法悉是無常？ 菩薩摩訶薩知有為法可說無常，是故一切有為無常。

src_original: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 知諸法性真實義中無因果故不可宣說，是故作相言一切法悉是生滅。

src_original: so 'tītān saṃskārānutpannaniruddhānsamanupaśyati /  teṣāṃ naiva hetumupalabhate nāpi svabhāvam /  tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /  pratyutpannāniruddhānsamanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 以是過去有為亦生亦滅，是故過去之法不見有因、不見有性。 以不見因性故，說過去法悉是無常。

src_original: teṣāṃ hetuṃ nopalabhate dattaphalatvāt /  svabhāvaṃ punarupalabhate aniruddhatvāt /  tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
tgt_original: 現在法知生而不知滅，現在之法不見其因，見果見性不滅，故知性不知因。

src_original: anāgatān saṃskārānanutpannāniruddhān paśyati /  teṣāṃ hetumupalabhate adattaphalatvāt /  no tu svabhāvamanutpannatvāt /  tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ (Dutt 189)  paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ /
tgt_original: 未來有為法不見生滅，是故知因、不知果不知性，以未生故，是故菩薩知因不知性。

src_original: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati  kṣaṇādurkṣvaṃ caturthaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 爾時觀三世一一念有三相，若過一念則有四相。

src_original: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo 'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati /
tgt_original: 先滅法已次第生相似法，是名為生。

src_original: utpannasya yastatkālāvipraṇāśaḥ sā sthitiriti paśyati /
tgt_original: 生已作事，是名為住。

src_original: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /  tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
tgt_original: 先滅法相滅法已見相似，是名為老。 生已不住至於二念，是名為壞。

src_original: sa yatsvabhāvameva tamutpannaṃ saṃskārakṣaṇaṃ samanupaśyati /  tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /  [na] paśyati tadanyasvabhāvān /
tgt_original: 菩薩見有為法相一種，如生，住老亦如是，唯壞相異。

src_original: bhāvaprabhāvitānyabhāvaprabhāvitāni ca /
tgt_original: 一者有； 二者無。

src_original: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati
tgt_original: 菩薩見有為法，不見生、不見住、不見老、不見壞。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmanāsraveṇānāsravāvāhakena cānāsravapṛṣṭalabdhena ca laukikena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ /  idamucyate kleśāvaraṇaviśudvijñānagocarastattvam /
tgt_original: 一切聲聞辟支佛等，以無漏智無漏道壞煩惱故得無礙智，是名淨煩惱障。

src_original: tenālambanena kleśāvaraṇāj (Dutt 26)  jñānaṃ viśudhyati /  anāvaraṇatve cāyatyāṃ santiṣṭhate /  tasmātkleśāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvamityucyate /
tgt_original: 以壞煩惱故智得明淨，智慧淨故身心無礙，是名淨智慧障真實義也。

src_original: saṃskāramātraṃ sa utpadyamānamupalabhate /  nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /  saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /  na tasyānyāṃ jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāmanityatāñca /
tgt_original: 生住老壞無真性故。 菩薩摩訶薩見色法生、色法住、色法老、色法壞，不見生住老壞。

src_original: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /  evañca punarvimṛśannopalabhate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩以方便觀，不見四相。 方便觀者，菩薩觀。

src_original: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate /
tgt_original: 若離色法別有生者，色法生時生亦應生。

src_original: tathaiva so 'pyutpadyeta /  evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /  ] yadi tāvadananyadevaṃ satyapārthikā jātidravyakalpanā /
tgt_original: 若爾者，一切諸法皆應二生： 一者色生； 二者生生。 如是二生，若即法若離法。

src_original: anyā jātirdravyato 'stītiṃ na yujyate /  (Dutt 190) atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati /  saṃskāra-janma jātiriti na yujyate /
tgt_original: 若不離者則無生生。 若言離法別有生者，是義不然。 若不離者，爾時色無有生。

src_original: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 生因緣故，生住老壞亦如是。

src_original: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /
tgt_original: 若壞自性有者，當知是壞亦生亦壞。

src_original: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt /  evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /  tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /
tgt_original: 若壞生者，當知一切有為之法悉無有滅，入滅定時心心數法常應還生，色法滅時亦應還生。 何以故？

src_original: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /
tgt_original: 是壞生故。 是故諸法悉應是常。

src_original: tatpunastatvaṃ katamat /
tgt_original: 云何復名真實？

src_original: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /  ato viparyayeṇa tu yujyate /  ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 是故菩薩離色法已不見四相，知有為法性無常故，亦常宣說有為無常。

src_original: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩觀見有為之法有三種苦：

src_original: sanniśrayabhāvena paśyati saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāśca /
tgt_original: 苦苦、行苦、壞苦。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 是故如來說有為法一切是苦。

src_original: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 云何菩薩見有為法無我？ 無我者有二種： 一者眾生無我；

src_original: pudgalanairātmyaṃ dharmanairātmyaṃ ca /  tatredaṃ pudgalanairātmyam /  yannaivate vidyamānā dharmāḥ pudgalāḥ /  nāpi vidyamānadharmavinirmukto 'nyaḥ pudgalo vidyate /
tgt_original: 二者法無我。 眾生無我者，眾生非是有法、非是無法、非是離有無法，是名眾生無我。

src_original: tatredaṃ dharmanairātmyam /  yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /
tgt_original: 法無我者，一切諸法可說，可說性無故，是名法無我。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
tgt_original: 有如是等二種無我，是故如來說有為法一切無我。

src_original: yaḥ punareṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ hetusamucchinnānāṃ paścādaśeṣoparamastadanyeṣāñcātyantamanabhinirvṛttiraprādurbhāvaḥ /  idamucyate nirvāṇam /
tgt_original: 如是有為斷現在因、障未來因，是名涅槃。

src_original: tacca śāntaṃ kleśopaśamāt duḥkhopaśamācca veditavyam /
tgt_original: 無煩惱結，故名寂靜。

src_original: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /  evañcābhivadati-śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti /  na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ (Dutt 191)  pravartate /
tgt_original: 若是菩薩以不淨心觀於涅槃、聲聞未得道果觀於涅槃，俱亦未實知涅槃性，亦是涅槃相。

src_original: asti tveṣa yoniśo manaskāraḥ /  tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ  syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā  sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /  athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /
tgt_original: 譬如大王為子息故刻木造作象馬鹿兔，王子亦於非真實象馬作真實想。

src_original: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /  eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /  athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet
tgt_original: 是王或時讚歎象馬，諸子各謂讚己象馬，其後出舍見真象馬即生慚愧： 『我等云何於非象馬生象馬想？

src_original: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /  ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ  varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake  tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇāritīyeran /
tgt_original: 云何於此同名同相生真實想？

src_original: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca  śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ  bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
tgt_original: 』如來亦說，菩薩心不清淨、聲聞之人未證道果住生死舍，如來為說涅槃寂靜。 菩薩聲聞聞已亦生真涅槃想，實不能知真涅槃也。

src_original: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /
tgt_original: 聞佛說時，生心作想言是涅槃。

src_original: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate  tadā teṣāmapi yathābhūtaḥ pratyavagama utpadyate /
tgt_original: 其後修集八正道已，得淨智慧出生死舍，爾乃真實知涅槃性，方生慚愧：

src_original: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /  asmābhistu pūrvabālaprajñatayā na yathābhūtamadhimuktam /  asti tu tadasya pratirūpakam /  asti pratibhāsamātrakam /  te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa (Dutt 192)
tgt_original: 『我等云何於非涅槃生涅槃想？

src_original: ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya /  tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet /  sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ /  teṣveva sāradarśī bhavet /
tgt_original: 』譬如病人往良醫所，爾時良醫為破病故隨病授藥，病者得已心生歡喜，作真藥想即便服之。

src_original: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /
tgt_original: 既服藥已，所患雖除，更發餘病。

src_original: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ  viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam /  sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /
tgt_original: 爾時良醫斷先所服更與餘藥，病者復言：

src_original: niṣkāraṇavatsalatā sarvasattveṣu /
tgt_original: 一者憐愍一切眾生；

src_original: sattvānāmevārthāya saṃsāre 'prameyaduḥkhasahiṣṇutā /
tgt_original: 二者為利眾生受生死苦；

src_original: bahukleśānāṃ durvineyānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ vinayopāyajñatā /
tgt_original: 三者以善方便調伏眾生；

src_original: paramadurvijñānatattvārthānupraveśaḥ /
tgt_original: 四者發心欲知甚深難義；

src_original: acintyaprabhāvatā ca /
tgt_original: 五者欲知不可思議神足。

src_original: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
tgt_original: 如是五法不與一切眾生共之，是故得名不可思議。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩復有五事不可思議。

src_original: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩為利眾生受於苦因，以受苦因故得受安樂，以受樂故具足成就不思議法。

src_original: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /  punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /  idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīyamanāścaryaṃ pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 復次菩薩觀生死過、涅槃寂靜，為眾生故不樂涅槃，流轉生死是名受樂，以受樂故具足成就不思議法。

src_original: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /
tgt_original: 復次菩薩樂於空閑寂靜默然，為諸眾生演說正法是名受樂，以受樂故具足成就不思議法。

src_original: idaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyamanāścaryaṃ pūrvavat /  punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /  na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /  idaṃ bodhisattvasya caturthamanāśvaryaṃ pūrvavat /  punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate /
tgt_original: 復次菩薩摩訶薩為眾生故行六波羅蜜，亦復不求六波羅蜜果是名受樂，以受樂故具足成就不思議法。 復次菩薩摩訶薩營他事業如造已務，甘心喜樂不辭懃苦是名受樂，以受樂故具足成就不思議法。

src_original: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩五事不可思議法。 菩薩復有五事，於諸眾生其心平等。

src_original: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /  tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
tgt_original: 三者菩薩修集一子地時，普為一切非為一人，是名平等。

src_original: anukampāsahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /  bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /  bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /  viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena  cetasā sarvasattveṣu samacitto viharati /
tgt_original: 四者菩薩普觀十二因緣一切等有，是名平等。

src_original: yathā caikasya sattvasyārthamācarati tathā sarveṣām /  evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /  ebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu samacitto bhavati /
tgt_original: 五者菩薩求阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，普為一切非為一人，是名平等。

src_original: pañcabhirākārairbodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu sarvopakārakriyā veditavyā /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩復有五事為利眾生：

src_original: samyagājīvavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa /
tgt_original: 一者教修正命；

src_original: anāthānāṃ ca duḥkhitānāṃ kṛpaṇānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ sanāthakriyayā /
tgt_original: 三者見貧窮者方便教令破貧窮苦；

src_original: sugatigamanāya mārgavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa yānatrayavyapadeśopasaṃhāreṇa ca /
tgt_original: 四者為上善者說正實道； 五者為三乘故說三乘法，是名五事利益。

src_original: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /
tgt_original: 眾生有五事法報菩薩恩：

src_original: duścaritaviveke /
tgt_original: 七者遠離惡知識故；

src_original: āvaraṇaviveke /  kleśaparyavasthānaviveke /  kleśapakṣadauṣṭhulyaviveke ca /
tgt_original: 九者遠離煩惱故； 十者得解脫故，是名為十。

src_original: catvāryāryaisatyāni duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaśca /
tgt_original: 真實者名為四諦，所謂苦集滅道。

src_original: uddānam /  vyākṛtirniyatau pāto hyavaśyakaraṇīyatā /  sātatyakaraṇīyañca prādhānyaṃ paścimaṃ bhavet //  ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ samāsatastathāgatā bodhisattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākurvanti /  katamaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 授菩薩記有六事： 一者定有菩薩性未發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心； 二者未有菩薩性而發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；

src_original: gotrasthamanutpāditacittam /  tathotpāditaṃ cittam sammukhāvasthitam /
tgt_original: 三者有菩薩性亦發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；

src_original: parimitaṃ kālamiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyata iti /  aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /  (Dutt 197)
tgt_original: 五者定得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不說時定； 六者定得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提亦說時定，是名為六。

src_original: traya ime bodhisattvasya niyatipātāḥ /  katame trayaḥ /
tgt_original: 有三事菩薩定得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提：

src_original: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
tgt_original: 二者得不退心；

src_original: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 三者凡所作事悉為眾生生善法芽。

src_original: ta ete trayo niyatipātā bhavanti /  gotrasthaniyatipātaḥ /  cittotpādaniyatipātaḥ /  abandhya-caryā-niyatipātaśca /  tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti /
tgt_original: 菩薩以是三定為佛所記。

src_original: ityetāni catvāryāryasatyāni pravicinvato 'bhisamāgacchato 'bhisamāgateṣu ca tajjñānamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 觀此四諦得實智慧，是名聲聞辟支佛。

src_original: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩不具五事不得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提：

src_original: prathamaścittotpādaḥ /
tgt_original: 一者不發菩提之心；

src_original: uttaptavīryam /
tgt_original: 三者不懃精進；

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasya sthānāni sātatyakaraṇīyāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 有五事菩薩常所修集：

src_original: anātheṣu sattveṣu [duḥkhiteṣu ca] apratiśaraṇeṣu sanāthakriyā /
tgt_original: 二者為破眾生貧窮困苦；

src_original: tathāgatapūjā skhalitaparijñānam /
tgt_original: 三者供養三寶； 四者至心持戒有犯尋覺；

src_original: sarvakriyācāravihāramanasikāreṣu bodhicittapūrvaṅgamatā bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ sātatyakaraṇīyam /
tgt_original: 五者所作善事悉以迴向阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti /  katame daśa /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩有十法勝一切法：

src_original: bodhisattvagotraṃ sarvagotrāṇāṃ pradhānam /  prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarvasamyak praṇidhānānaṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 一者菩薩性勝一切性； 二者初發菩提心勝於一切世間出世間發心；

src_original: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 三者毘梨耶波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜勝於一切諸波羅蜜；

src_original: priyavāditā sarvasaṃgrahavastūnāṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 四者軟語攝法勝於諸攝；

src_original: tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 五者如來勝於一切眾生；

src_original: karūṇā 'pramāṇānāṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 六者悲心勝於一切無量心；

src_original: caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ [sarvadhyānānāṃ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 七者所修四禪勝一切禪；

src_original: ] trayāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ śūnyatāsamādhiḥ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 八者空三昧勝一切三昧；

src_original: sarvasamāpattīnāṃ (Dutt 198)  nirodhasamāpattiḥ pradhānam /
tgt_original: 九者滅盡定勝一切滅定；

src_original: sarvopāyakauśalyānāṃ viśuddhamupāyakauśalyaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ pradhānam /  uddānam /
tgt_original: 十者淨方便勝一切方便，是為十法。

src_original: katamāni catvāri /  dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca /
tgt_original: 二者實流布； 三者方便流布； 四者乘流布。

src_original: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /
tgt_original: 法流布者，次第演說十二部經。

src_original: idamucyate dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānam /  satyaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ punaranekavidham /  avitathārthena tāvadekameva satyaṃ na dvitīyamasti /
tgt_original: 實流布者有一種，謂不妄語。

src_original: dvividhaṃ satyam /  saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 復有二種，謂世諦、第一義諦。

src_original: trividhaṃ satyam /
tgt_original: 復有三種：

src_original: lakṣaṇasatyaṃ vāksatyaṃ kriyāsatyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 相實、口實、行實。

src_original: [caturvidhaṃ satyam /  ] duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvanmārgasatyam /
tgt_original: 復有四種，謂苦、集、滅、道。

src_original: pañcavidhaṃ [satyam /
tgt_original: 復有五種： 一者因實； 二者果實； 三者智實；

src_original: ] hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 四者知境界實； 五者無上實。

src_original: ṣaḍvidhaṃ [satyam] /
tgt_original: 復有六種：

src_original: satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 一者實實； 二者虛妄實； 三者智實； 四者遠離實； 五者證實；

src_original: āsvādasatyaṃ ādīnavasatyaṃ niḥsaraṇasatyaṃ dharmatāsatyaṃ adhimuktisatyaṃ āryāṇāṃ satyaṃ anāryāṇāṃ satyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 三者解脫實； 四者法實； 五者解實； 六者聖實； 七者非聖實。

tgt_original: 調伏方便無量者，如初品中說，是故菩薩五種無量攝取一切方便。

src_original: pañceme buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /  katame pañca /
tgt_original: 諸佛菩薩為眾生說法有五事：

src_original: tadekatyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti /
tgt_original: 三者說時即發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；

src_original: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ pratilabhante /

tgt_original: 五者眾生聞已受持讀誦書寫解說護持正法，是名諸佛菩薩為眾生說法得大功德不可思議。

src_original: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /  katamāni sapta /
tgt_original: 云何名大乘？ 有七事大，故名大乘。

src_original: adhimuktimahattvam /

src_original: tadyathaikatyaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmiṃ (Dutt 202)  samatikramyādhyāśayaśuddhibhūmimanupraviśati /

src_original: sambhāramahattvam /

src_original: sa punaḥ satyābhisamayaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ skandhamātramupalabhamānānāṃ skandhebhyaścānyamarthāntaramātmānamanupalabhamānānāṃ

src_original: kālamahattvam /

tgt_original: 法大、心大、解大、淨大、莊嚴大、時大，如是六大名之為因；

src_original: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /

src_original: bodhisattvapiṭakadeśanā /

src_original: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /  tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /  tasya ca yadyoniśaḥ śravaṇam /  yoniśaśca cintāpūrvakamadhyāśayopagamanam /  adhyāśayopagamanapūrvaṃkaśca bhāvanākārapraveśaḥ /  bhāvanākārapraveśapūrvikā ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpattiḥ /  taśyā eva ca bhāvanāphalapariniṣpatteratyantanairyāṇikatā /
tgt_original: 說菩薩藏義，說菩薩藏中諸佛菩薩不可思議，思惟其義，修集其義，得具足義，得修集果，解甚深義，是名為八。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /

src_original: sa eva punaḥ paripakvau dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 熟有二種：

src_original: ekajātipratibaddho yasya janmano 'nantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /  caramabhavikaśca tasminneva janmani sthito 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /

src_original: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /

src_original: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /  yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /  teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /
tgt_original: 是十種菩薩攝一切菩薩。 若能至心受持修行菩薩戒者，是名菩薩、是名摩訶薩、是名智者、是名勇健、是名上仙、是名佛子、是名佛持、是名大勝、是名佛戒、是名無畏、是名大聖、是名商主、是名船師、是名大名稱、是名憐愍、是名大功德、是名自在、是名法持、是名不可思議、是名能知十方無量世界如觀掌中阿摩勒果。 若有人言：

tgt_original: 』受持菩薩戒，至心修行信菩薩戒，是名入十種菩薩中，不久定得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 2 如法住1 菩薩相品如法住菩薩相品第一「真實菩薩有五種相，菩薩具足五種相故名真實菩薩。

src_original: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
tgt_original: 一者憐愍心； 二者柔軟語； 三者勇健； 四者不貪； 五者解說深義。

src_original: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /  svabhāvato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ phalānusaṃśataḥ anukramataḥ saṃgrahataśca /
tgt_original: 如是五法有五種智： 一者性； 二者因緣； 三者功德果； 四者次第；

src_original: tatrānukampāyāḥ svabhāvo dvividhaḥ /
tgt_original: 憐愍性者有二種：

src_original: tatrāśayagato hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayaśca bodhisattvasya sattveṣvanukampetyucyate /  pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /
tgt_original: 至心者，施眾安隱，是名為性。 如法者，菩薩摩訶薩如已樂事以施眾生，是名如法。

src_original: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
tgt_original: 柔軟性者，先意語、歡喜語、遠惡語、利益語，是名柔軟性。

src_original: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /  tatra yā bodhisattvasyodāradānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā vā /  ayaṃ muktahastatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 勇健性者，心無所畏猛健果敢，能破眾生畏懼之想，是名健性。 不貪性者，一切施一切施，一切施清淨施，施已無悔，是名不貪性。

src_original: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ
tgt_original: 解說深義性者，四無礙智是名解說深義性。

src_original: tatrānukampāyāḥ pañcādhiṣṭhānāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 憐愍者有五因緣：

src_original: duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
tgt_original: 一者受苦眾生； 二者行惡眾生； 三者放逸眾生； 四者邪見眾生； 五者樂煩惱眾生。

src_original: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate /  (Dutt 208) ime [te] sattvā duḥkhitā ityucyante /
tgt_original: 受苦眾生者，常受苦惱乃至無有一念之樂，是名受苦。

src_original: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritamadhyācaranti /  tatra cābhiratarūpā viharanti /  ime sattvā duścaritacāriṇa ityucyante tadyathā aurabhrika-śaukarika-kaukkuṭikaprabhṛtayaḥ /
tgt_original: 又有眾生雖不受苦，造身口意十惡業道，如十六惡律儀，是名行惡眾生。

src_original: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ  ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
tgt_original: 復有眾生不行惡業、不受苦惱，貪著五欲耽樂嬉戲，貪愛己身不修善法，是名放逸。

src_original: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /  ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ /  ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca  vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak
tgt_original: 復有眾生不受苦惱、不行惡業亦不放逸，為求解脫非因見因、非果見果，是名邪見，如外道等。 復有眾生不受苦惱、不行惡業亦不放逸亦不邪見，具煩惱繫，煩惱障故不修善法，是名憐愍因緣。

src_original: prayuktāḥ pṛthagjanā kalyāṇakā ye ca śaikṣāḥ etāvadanukampādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ  yenādhiṣṭhānena yenālambanenānukampā pravartate /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 以是因緣，憐愍之心遂得增長。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvānāṃ priyavāditāyā adhiṣṭhānāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 柔軟因緣者有五種： 一者善先語；

src_original: samyagālapanā samyagānandanā samyagāśvāsanā samyakpravāraṇā nyāyopadeśaśca /
tgt_original: 二者善喜語； 三者善無畏語； 四者善淨語； 五者善教語。

src_original: teṣāṃ punaḥ pratibhāgo veditavyaḥ /  tadyathā saṃgrahavastupaṭale /  ebhiḥ paccabhiradhiṣṭhānairebhirālambanairbodhisattvānāṃ priyavāditā pravartate /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
tgt_original: 此五因緣是名柔軟語，如〈四攝品〉中說。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni veditavyāni /  katamāni pañca /  yaireva pañcabhirākārairbodhipakṣapaṭale dhṛtibalādhānatā bodhisattvānāmuktā tānyeva bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni ve ditavyāni /  yairadhiṣṭhānairyairālambanairbodhisattvasya vairya pravartate /  nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /  (Dutt 209)
tgt_original: 勇健因緣者有五種，如上〈三十七助菩提品〉中說。

src_original: pañcemāni bodhisattvasya muktahastatāyā adhiṣṭhānāni /  katamāni pañca /
tgt_original: 不貪者有五因緣：

src_original: abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
tgt_original: 一者不分別施； 二者喜施；
